Reviews.Title: WHAT WAS SENT WAS NOT AS DESCRIBED!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Bennett
Reviews.Content: I DID NOT RECEIVE WHAT I ORDERED!1- 40.5mm +1 +2 +4 +10 Close-Up Macro Filter Set with Pouch (More Macro with ANY Lens!) - RECEIVED 52mm SET!1- 40.5mm 0.45x Wide Angle Lens w/ Pouch and Caps (Capture That View!) - RECEIVED 52mm 0.45x WIDE ANGLE LENS!1- 40.5mm 2x Telephoto Lens W/ Pouch and Caps (More Zoom is better!) - RECEIVED 52mm 2x TELEPHOTO LENS!1- 40.5mm 3 Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, Circular Polarizer and Flourescent Filter and Hard Case - DID NOT RECEIVE!1- Pack of LCD Screen Protectors (Protect your LCD!) - DID NOT RECEIVE!1- Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit - DID NOT RECEIVE!1- Mini Table Top Tripod - DID NOT RECEIVE!1- DavisMAX MicroFiber Cloth - DID NOT RECEIVE!EXTRA ITEM THAT I DID RECEIVE WAS A 40.5mm to 52mm STEPPING RING.I bought this kit because it specifically states that all components are 40.5mm and I don't care to use adapters.  I also thought it was a pretty good deal because of some of the extra goodies, like the mini tripod and cleaning kit that I didn't receive.I know that the holiday rush is on, but you guys really screwed up on this one!  I'm sending the wrong size lenses back, hopefully for a full refund.  I thought I was buying a complete kit but what I got was a couple of lenses that are the wrong size and an adapter.  There's a new Amazon distribution center that was just built in Schertz, TX, not far from where I live so I think that I'll try to return what I did receive to them in person!
